properties.description: At the moment we cater for toddlers and parents on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday mornings and older people on Wednesday afternoons. Tuesday mornings are for toddlers and parents and carers only. Monday and Wednesday mornings are parents/ grandparents and toddlers only. Wednesday afternoons we offer tea or coffee and cake with jig saw puzzles and board games to all comers.
